AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.large white Ford pickup truck: vehicle driven by Brignoni-Ponce Jacquinot, stopped by United States/Mexican Border Patrol due to suspicious behavior and proximity to the United States/Mexican Border, deviating from typical traffic patterns on Texas Highway 385 early on a Sunday morning, with an indirect travel route from Big Bend National Park to Alpine, Texas, bearing a Kansas license plate
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Michael Brett Jacquinot: defendant who appealed his conviction for possession with intent to distribute marijuana
